class.rdfs:comment: The act of participating in exertive activity for the purposes of improving health and fitness.
class.rdfs:label: ExerciseAction

schema:course.rdfs:comment: A sub property of location. The course where this action was taken.
schema:course.rdfs:label: course

schema:diet.rdfs:comment: A sub property of instrument. The diet used in this action.
schema:diet.rdfs:label: diet

schema:distance.rdfs:comment: The distance travelled, e.g. exercising or travelling.
schema:distance.rdfs:label: distance

schema:exerciseCourse.rdfs:comment: A sub property of location. The course where this action was taken.
schema:exerciseCourse.rdfs:label: exerciseCourse

schema:exercisePlan.rdfs:comment: A sub property of instrument. The exercise plan used on this action.
schema:exercisePlan.rdfs:label: exercisePlan

schema:exerciseRelatedDiet.rdfs:comment: A sub property of instrument. The diet used in this action.
schema:exerciseRelatedDiet.rdfs:label: exerciseRelatedDiet

schema:exerciseType.rdfs:comment: Type(s) of exercise or activity, such as strength training, flexibility training, aerobics, cardiac rehabilitation, etc.
schema:exerciseType.rdfs:label: exerciseType

schema:fromLocation.rdfs:comment: A sub property of location. The original location of the object or the agent before the action.
schema:fromLocation.rdfs:label: fromLocation

schema:opponent.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The opponent on this action.
schema:opponent.rdfs:label: opponent

schema:sportsActivityLocation.rdfs:comment: A sub property of location. The sports activity location where this action occurred.
schema:sportsActivityLocation.rdfs:label: sportsActivityLocation

schema:sportsEvent.rdfs:comment: A sub property of location. The sports event where this action occurred.
schema:sportsEvent.rdfs:label: sportsEvent

schema:sportsTeam.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The sports team that participated on this action.
schema:sportsTeam.rdfs:label: sportsTeam

schema:toLocation.rdfs:comment: A sub property of location. The final location of the object or the agent after the action.
schema:toLocation.rdfs:label: toLocation
